version_description:
New clothing packs available in the Store!

As well as lots of bug fixes and updates for you Legends!

- Trading issues (eg. showing baby icon when trading any aged Pets)
- Forest Portal fix
- Fixed items not updating on log out
- Added store button to the main menu panel
- Server name now shown in the settings

- Added store button to the main menu panel
- Server name now shown in the settings

Adding in brand new Clothing Packs!
Fixing bugs to improve the gameplay experience.

Continuously adding bug fixes to improve your World of Pets experience!

Happy Hatching.

Emotes, Quests, Maps and more!

Players will now be able to purchase and unlock emotes through a unique set of quests! And what better way to get around with your friends than your brand new mini-map!

This build brings plenty of bug fixes, stability and fun for players!
